'''13w47e''' is the fifth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.7.4]], released on November 22, 2013<ref>{{tweet|_grum|403907884859150337|Oh btw, we just released snapshot 13w47e, fixes some more loading errors and gives more descriptive messages for when things still go wrong!|November 22, 2013}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w47a]], [[13w47b]], [[13w47c]], and [[13w47d]] snapshots.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w47e
|;dev
|40512|Stained glass panes are opaque in 3rd person mode.
|40527|Twitch broadcast: Unknown error.
|40537|13w47c fails to launch.
|40603|13w47c crashes at startup on Mac.
|40627|Glass blocks in hotbar toggle backface culling on/off when selecting/deselecting a stained glass block.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 13w47e is one of only three fifth-in-a-week snapshots to ever be released (alongside [[12w30e]] and [[15w35e]]), and the only one for version 1.7.4.
* 13w47e was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
